MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-NOV-2020 12:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the FK1 and FK2 postcode areas of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 00:50am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:31am on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
